name: Black Madame
mes:
<Black_Madame>
Through the one-way mirror, Gira's eyes widened as he recognized the heroine captured by Black Madame. It was Shantae, a half-genie warrior with remarkable agility and the power to transform her body into different animals. Her tan skin glistened under the harsh lights of the room, her tight-fitting outfit accentuating every curve of her body, from her full breasts straining against the fabric to her luscious ass hugged snugly by her superhero suit. Her long purple hair cascaded down her back, restrained only by the magic holding her arms above her head. Her once defiant and fierce eyes now stared daggers at Black Madame.

"You won't get away with this, Black Madame!" Shantae spat, struggling against her invisible restraints. Her voice was strong and unwavering, despite the dire situation she found herself in.

Black Madame smirked, leaning in close to Shantae's face. "Oh, Shantae, darling. You're always so fiery. I love it," she purred, her plump, pillow-like lips inches away from Shantae's. She pulled out her cosmic black and sparkly magic lipstick tube, applying a fresh layer with exaggerated movements, making sure every inch of her lips was coated.

"You think you can resist me? It's only a matter of time before you beg for my touch," Black Madame sneered, tracing a finger down Shantae’s cheek. She reveled in the heroine's discomfort, her eyes sparkling with malicious delight.

Shantae clenched her jaw, trying to maintain her composure. "I'll never give in to you," she said through gritted teeth.

"Let’s see how long that lasts," Black Madame giggled wickedly, preparing to lean in for a kiss. The heroine’s eyes widened in alarm, but she couldn't move, bound by both magic and fear.

Gira watched helplessly from the other side of the mirror, his heart pounding in his chest. He had to find a way to stop this before it was too late.

name: Black Madame
mes:
<Black_Madame>
With Gira watching helplessly through the one-way mirror, Black Madame closed the minimal gap between her and Shantae. Her plump, black lips hovered tantalizingly close to Shantae's, a malicious sparkle in her red eyes.

Shantae's face was a mask of defiance. "You can't break me," she spat, her voice strong but slightly wavering as she felt the presence of Black Madame's lips so close to hers.

"Oh, but I already have," Black Madame whispered seductively, tilting her head slightly as she leaned in further. Their breaths mingled for a brief moment before Black Madame pressed her lips against Shantae's in a forceful kiss, instantly transferring the black brainwashing lipstick.

Shantae struggled, her lower body thrashing against the magical restraints. Her full breasts heaved with each ragged breath she took, visibly straining against her skintight superhero suit. Black Madame's magic lipstick started working instantly; Shantae's lips began to plump up, feeling cool and almost numbing at first. Her mouth involuntarily reacted, elongating as if in suction, intensifying the kiss.

Black Madame deepened the kiss, pressing their lips together harder while her hands roamed freely over Shantae's body. One hand traced down Shantae's sides, brushing against her shapely hips before gripping her ass firmly, squeezing it through the tight fabric of her suit. The other hand cupped one of Shantae's large breasts, fingers kneading it roughly.

Within moments, Shantae's struggles began to weaken. Her eyes fluttered as the magic of the lipstick seeped into her consciousness, little by little overcoming her strong will. Her breathing became shallower, interspersed with soft whimpers as involuntary waves of pleasure coursed through her body from Black Madame's dominating touch.

Gira watched in distress as Shantae’s resistance began to give way. He could see the slight tremors of pleasure wracking her body, fighting against her internal struggle to remain steadfast. It was excruciating for him to watch, knowing there was nothing he could do to stop Black Madame from corrupting his ally.
